rows.label: qst202601_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, you return, my wayward child.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0002
rows.name:
Just passing by.
I wasn't particularly keen on seeing
your old mug again, Dad.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0003
rows.name: You never change, do you, Zeke?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, no matter. As it happens,
I have a request to ask of you.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0005
rows.name: Oh, yeah?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0006
rows.name:
There's a new type of monster we've
never seen before in the
Genbu Divine Beast.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0008
rows.name:
It's been roaming around the Amphoret
Pillar for now, but there's no telling
when it may decide to attack Teos Aure.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0009
rows.name:
Why d'you need us? Can't you get the
military to do something about it?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0010
rows.name:
I could, but with the Holy Grail and Ten'i
at your disposal, having you handle it
would keep casualties to a minimum.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0011
rows.name: Is that an order, Your Majesty?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0012
rows.name:
No, not an order. It is a request...
that we may protect the lives of the
people.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0013
rows.name:
What do you say, Ten'i?
Would you lend us your power?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0014
rows.name:
As you know, Your Majesty,
I once ran out of control and
tried to destroy your kingdom.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0015
rows.name:
If I am made to fight again in
close proximity, there's every
possibility that...that I'll...

rows.label: qst202601_msg0017
rows.name:
That's enough. I told you before, you're
not the same as you once were.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0018
rows.name:
And above all, Rex believes in you.
Do not forget that.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0029
rows.name:
And above all, Nia believes in you.
Do not forget that.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0030
rows.name:
And above all, Zeke believes in you.
Do not forget that.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0031
rows.name:
And above all, Meleph believes in you.
Do not forget that.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0019
rows.name: I understand that...but...

rows.label: qst202601_msg0020
rows.name:
If you understand that, then what need
have you to be despondent?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0023
rows.name:
Look at it this way. If you truly feel
responsible for your actions, then think
of this as a means of repentance.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0024
rows.name:
And what greater service could be
done than protecting the lives of
the kingdom?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0025
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: qst202601_msg0026
rows.name: Ten'i, we beseech you. Help us.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0027
rows.name:
Go with Rex and use your powers
to save Luxuria.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0028
rows.name:
Go with Nia and use your powers
to save Luxuria.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0033
rows.name:
Go with Zeke and use your powers
to save Luxuria.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0034
rows.name:
Go with Meleph and use your powers
to save Luxuria.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0032
rows.name:
Understood. I will assist you to the
utmost of my ability...
